ui-predicate

Namespaces

  • React
    • UIPredicateCoreReact

UIPredicateCoreReact.js

  1. /* eslint no-unused-vars: "off"*/
  3. /**
  4.  * ReactJS adapter for ui-predicate-core
  5.  * @namespace React
  6.  * @since 1.0.0
  7.  */
  9. import assign from "lodash/assign";
  10. import { PredicateCore, UITypes } from "ui-predicate-core";
  11. import DEFAULT_COMPONENTS from "../components/default-components";
  13. const defaults = {
  14.   options: {
  15.     /**
  16.      * UIPredicate React Adapter own default argument component
  17.      * @param {Object} [columns=PredicateCore.defaults.columns] columns
  18.      * @param {Object} [options=PredicateCore.defaults.options] options
  19.      * @param {Object} [ui=PredicateCore.defaults.ui] ui
  20.      * @return {React.component} the default React Component to use as argument specifier
  21.      * @see core.defaults.getDefaultArgumentComponent
  22.      * @memberof React.defaults
  23.      */
  24.     getDefaultArgumentComponent(columns, options, ui) {
  25.       /*
  26.         "ui" arg. results from DEFAULT_COMPONENTS
  27.         and :ui attribute passed to <ui-predicate>
  28.         all merged in UIPredicateCoreReact()
  29.         and passed to PredicateCore
  30.       */
  31.       return ui[UITypes.ARGUMENT_DEFAULT];
  32.     }
  33.   }
  34. };
  36. /**
  37.  * UIPredicateCore adapter for ReactJS
  38.  * @param {?dataclasses.CompoundPredicate} [data=PredicateCore.defaults.options.getDefaultData] data
  39.  * @param {Object} [columns=PredicateCore.defaults.columns] columns
  40.  * @param {Object} [ui=PredicateCore.defaults.ui] ui
  41.  * @param {Object} [options=PredicateCore.defaults.options] options
  42.  * @return {Promise<core.PredicateCoreAPI>} resolved promise yield a PredicateCoreAPI
  43.  * @memberof React
  44.  */
  45. function UIPredicateCoreReact({ data, columns, ui, options } = {}) {
  46.   return PredicateCore({
  47.     data,
  48.     columns,
  49.     ui: assign({}, DEFAULT_COMPONENTS, ui),
  50.     options: assign({}, defaults.options, options)
  51.   });
  52. }
  54. UIPredicateCoreReact.defaults = defaults;
  56. export { UIPredicateCoreReact };
